section.33: Retiring to a Mosque for Remembrance of Allah (I'tikaf)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:that `Umar had vowed in the Pre-Islamic period to perform I`tikaf in Al-Masjid-al-Haram. (A subnarrator thinks that `Umar vowed to perform I`tikaf for one night.) Allah's Messenger (ï·º) said to `Umar, "Fulfill your vow
